title: Here's what a potential SpaceX mega-merger could mean for Elon Musk's business empire
full_text: Here's what a potential SpaceX mega-merger could mean for Elon Musk's business empire. SpaceX is gearing up for a massive IPO this year, and multiple reports suggested the rocket giant is considering mergers with Tesla or xAI.. Bringing SpaceX and xAI together fits with Elon Musk's vision for an AI-powered future.Andrew Harnik/Getty Images <ul><li>SpaceX is reportedly lining up a mega-merger with Tesla or xAI before its bl… [+4789 chars]
